languages.text: The wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} made against enemies under the effect of Expose Weakness decrease the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} by −10.

traits.locale_text: The wearer's melee attacks against enemies under the effect of Expose Weakness decrease the enemy's Strength and Agility by −10.
